bibl.title: Excavating Love Magic at Roman Karanis.
New Archaeological and Papyrological Researches on the Fayyum. Proceedings of the International Meeting of Egyptology and Papyrology, Lecce, June 8th-10th, 2005
bibl.author: WILBURN, Andrew T.

bibl.note: A group of finds discovered beneath house 165 at Karanis (excavations of the University of Michigan, 1924-1936), including a mud figurine and 3 hairpins, reveals the enactment of a love spell. The magical papyri indicate how the magic functioned.
WILBURN Andrew T., Excavating Love Magic at Roman Karanis.

Mario CAPASSO and Paola DAVOLI (Edd.), New Archaeological and Papyrological Researches on the Fayyum. Proceedings of the International Meeting of Egyptology and Papyrology, Lecce, June 8th-10th, 2005 = Papyrologica Lupiensia. 14/2005 (Galatina, 2007) pp. 355-370, 3 figg., 1 carte, 1 plan.
